document.full_text: renault sought to move on from an embarrassing botched spy probe, pledging on friday to quickly find a new chief operating officer as it took a step toward firing a security executive at the heart of the investigation.
document.title: renault seeks to move on from spy scandal
lines_and_colors: renault sought to move on from an embarrassing botched spy probe, pledging on friday to quickly find a new chief operating officer as it took a step toward firing a security executive at the heart of the investigation.
